page.title: 17SHOPPING HABITS
page.content:
A questionnaire was sent to the parents of the British School and Bluecoat School children.There were 252 replies.All numbers are percentages of the people asked.
{1 The bulk of the groceries are bought {at}Yate 35.8, Wotton 35, Dursley 12.5, Carrefour 8, Thornbury 2.7, Gloucester 1.5, Elsewhere 4.5.
{2 Those that use Wotton grocers-}Co-op 73.4, Spar,Wortley Rd.12.5, Spar, Long St. 8.4, V.G 3.2, Synwell Stores 2.5
{3 Clothes are bought at}Bristol 37.8, Gloucester 20 Yate 11.6, Bath 9.4,Wotton 9 Elsewhere 12.2,
{4 Electrical goods are bought at _ Bristol 39.8, Yate 23, Gloucester 15, Wotton 12, Bath 1.4, Elsewhere 8.8
